title: ICYMI - New COVID-19 Variants Found in the U.S. & Anti-Asian Racism Is on the Rise
itunes:title: ICYMI - New COVID-19 Variants Found in the U.S. & Anti-Asian Racism Is on the Rise
description:
Several new coronavirus variants are originating in the U.S., Ronny Chieng offers ways to fight hate crimes against Asian Americans, and the remote education crisis worsens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
